name: Catshier - Arcade Cashier Simulator with Cats
name_original: Catshier - Arcade Cashier Simulator with Cats
description:
Do you have spare change? I hope so, because in this game you need to do the math, plan strategy. Make sure you don't let the queue be too long. Crossing the red line = you are fired!

Yea, the game is not working properly, we know, we are tired, finishing jam with almost complete game. We will update it in a few days, so please check itch.io later

Made for Ludum Dare 44 Jam
Theme: Your life is currency

We were asking ourselfs who's life is full of currency and money. That's why we decided to do ARCADE CASHIER GAME WITH CATS (now with more paws and catnip!)

Controls:
Move your mouse (hehe in game with cats) to control paw
Click left mouse button to grab money and organize stuff

Credits:
Gamedesign - Bartosz 'Reeposter' Jakubczyński, Maciej 'macu' Różewicz
Programming - Maciej 'Rondaar' Sozański, Maciej 'macu' Różewicz
Help with code + provider of a sock with printed cat, which was template for all the cats in the game* - 'azetka'
2D art + visuals - Bartosz 'Reeposter' Jakubczyński
